name: Stick it (MisterIXI)
description:
Use your duct tape to stick and cut objects in the levels to break the rules!

Controls:

  • LMB - Hold and drag to stick duct tape and fixate objects
  • RMB - Hold and drag to cut duct tape to release the stuck objects
  • WASD - Move around
  • SPACE - Jump (You may walljump when your feet touch a wall)
  • R - Restart Level
  • B - Back To Main Menu

Note: As said in the credits, everything was done by me (Yannik Brändle / MisterIXI) during the jam. The background image was generated with stable diffusion and the rest was made with Paint.net, Jsfxr, audacity and Unity3d
